name: Ramada Groton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband & I stayed 2 nites here in April, we arrived early 1pm and ask if we could check in early, was told we could but there would be a $15.00 early registration fee,( not posted anywhere) was given a key and went to room that was not cleaned yet, went back to front desk, and they gave us another room.
reviews.title: rooms nice, but think twice,,,,,,

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Misleading advertising,, in our opinion, complimentary breakfast means full breakfast not continental.
reviews.title: Good place to stay, but.............

reviews.text: The Jacuzzi was closed per order of Board of Health, was not going to take chance and swim in the pool ( our choice)
reviews.title: Enjoyable experience!! I would recommend this hotel to my friends and family.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the rooms were fine served the purpose, upon check out
reviews.title: Very clean & Comfortable and a great value

reviews.text: they did not want to give me a receipt as I paid in advance, I said that I had to pay a early registration fee and want a receipt, was given a hand written receipt.
reviews.title: The most miserable place to be...come on down!!

reviews.text: I travel extensively as part of my job and stay in about 45 different hotels per year. I have sen a lot of 3-4 star hotels that left me wondering how they got them.
reviews.title: Extremely Friendly Staff

likes.disliked: — Pool temp, no house computer in lobby

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was great! The staff was friendly from the moment I checked in to the time I left. Every time I walked past the front desk I was greeted and asked if everything was ok.
reviews.title: Understaffed, overpriced.

likes.liked: — Comfortable bed, close to Mohegan Sun

reviews.text: The staff is of Indian ethnicity and this is probably the reason for the warm attitude. All across the country, whenever I come in contact with this culture - they are warm and accommodating.
reviews.title: Reservation Gone Bad

reviews.text: Rooms were clean and temp was set perfect upon arrival. The pool was indoors and heated. The temp of the water was a bit cooler than I would have expected but I think they had problems with their heater as the hot tub was not working either. Water was a bit cloudy but, it was probably due to the heavy chlorine.
reviews.title: Enjoyed the Ramada Groton very much!

likes.disliked: — Room was not heated prior arrival.

reviews.text: Overall appearance was clean throughout. Breakfast was opened on time. They had eggs, bacon and sausage you could heat in a microwave, in addition to fruit, rolls, muffins etc. Orange juice was good, coffee was good. Plenty of food to choose from.
reviews.title: Excellent value and home base between Mystic and Mohegan

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived after midnight on Thanksgiving night... the room was warm and the lights were on, as if they were waiting for us. Welcoming room for weary travelers like us away for Thanksgiving. Great value for the price. Man at the front desk was super nice and the best part about this Ramada Inn, ladies, AVEDA products free in the bathroom. Ha ha!
reviews.title: Quality on a budget!

likes.liked: — Aveda products, easy to get to!

reviews.text: Our stay with the Ramada was excellent. We planned on staying for 2 nights. For the price and location- this is the best value I have found in the area. We ended up canceling our reservations at a nearby inn.
reviews.title: Excellent service & value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While on our way to the hotel we had taken the wrong exit and 15 min. away. The gentleman was very paitent and understanding in guiding us from Ledyard. Our room had two beds-very comferatable--- queen?-- cd player and a fridge and microwave. Breakfast was nice- eggs, sausage, juices, etc. My wife did use the salon and went tanning. The pool and sauna were average--
reviews.title: Great Stay.

description: Recently Renovated Summer 2007!! Two Story, 69 Room Hotel. Continental Breakfast 7 days a week. 24/7 Coffee. Indoor heated Pool & Jacuzzi. Restaurant & Hair Salon on-site. Pet Friendly. Truck Parking Available. Close to major attractions.
